verses.verse: Moreover, from the blue<WH8504> and purple<WH713> and scarlet<WH8144> [material,] they made<WH6213> finely<WH8278> woven<WH8278> garments<WH899> for ministering<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place, as well as the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> which<WH834> were for Aaron,<WH175> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And he made<WH6213> the ephod<WH646> of gold,<WH2091> [and] of blue<WH8504> and purple<WH713> and scarlet<WH8144> [material,] and fine<WH8336> twisted<WH7806> linen.<WH8336>

Then they hammered<WH7554> out gold<WH2091> sheets<WH9449> and cut<WH7112> [them] into threads<WH6616> to be woven<WH6213> in [with] the blue<WH8504> and the purple<WH713> and the scarlet<WH8144> [material,] and the fine<WH8336> linen,<WH8336> the work<WH4639> of a skillful<WH2803> workman.<WH2803>
They made<WH6213> attaching<WH2266> shoulder<WH3802> pieces for the ephod; it was attached<WH2266> at its two<WH8147> [upper] ends.<WH7117>

And the skillfully<WH2805> woven<WH2805> band<WH2805> which<WH834> was on it was like its workmanship,<WH4639> of the same<WH4480> material: of gold<WH2091> [and] of blue<WH8504> and purple<WH713> and scarlet<WH8144> [material,] and fine<WH8336> twisted<WH7806> linen,<WH8336> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And they made<WH6213> the onyx<WH7718> stones,<WH68> set<WH5437> in gold<WH2091> filigree<WH4865> [settings;] they were engraved<WH9466> [like] the engravings<WH6603> of a signet,<WH2368> according<WH5921> to the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And he placed<WH7760> them on the shoulder<WH3802> pieces of the ephod,<WH646> [as] memorial<WH2146> stones<WH68> for the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And he made<WH6213> the breastpiece,<WH2833> the work<WH4639> of a skillful<WH2803> workman,<WH2803> like the workmanship<WH4639> of the ephod:<WH646> of gold<WH2091> [and] of blue<WH8504> and purple<WH713> and scarlet<WH8144> [material] and fine<WH8336> twisted<WH7806> linen.<WH8336>
It was square;<WH7251> they made<WH6213> the breastpiece<WH2833> folded<WH3717> double,<WH3717> a span<WH2239> long<WH753> and a span<WH2239> wide<WH7341> when folded<WH3717> double.<WH3717>
And they mounted<WH4390> four<WH702> rows<WH2905> of stones<WH68> on it. The first<WH259> row<WH2905> [was] a row<WH2905> of ruby,<WH124> topaz,<WH6357> and emerald;<WH1304>
and the second<WH8145> row,<WH2905> a turquoise,<WH5306> a sapphire<WH5601> and a diamond;<WH3095>
and the third<WH7992> row,<WH2905> a jacinth,<WH3958> an agate,<WH7618> and an amethyst;<WH306>
and the fourth<WH7243> row,<WH2905> a beryl,<WH8658> an onyx,<WH7718> and a jasper.<WH3471> They were set<WH5437> in gold<WH2091> filigree<WH4865> [settings] when they were mounted.<WH4396>

And the stones<WH68> were corresponding<WH5921> to the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> they were twelve,<WH8147> <WH6240> corresponding<WH5921> to their names,<WH8034> [engraved with] the engravings<WH6603> of a signet,<WH2368> each<WH376> with its name<WH8034> for the twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> tribes.<WH7626>
And they made<WH6213> on the breastpiece<WH2833> chains<WH8333> like cords,<WH5688> of twisted<WH1383> cordage<WH5688> work<WH4639> in pure<WH2889> gold.<WH2091>

And they made<WH6213> two<WH8147> gold<WH2091> filigree<WH4865> [settings] and two<WH8147> gold<WH2091> rings,<WH2885> and put<WH5414> the two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> on the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the breastpiece.<WH2833>
Then they put<WH5414> the two<WH8147> gold<WH2091> cords<WH5688> in the two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> at the ends<WH7098> of the breastpiece.<WH2833>

And they put<WH5414> the [other] two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the two<WH8147> cords<WH5688> on the two<WH8147> filigree<WH4865> [settings,] and put<WH5414> them on the shoulder<WH3802> pieces of the ephod<WH646> at the front<WH6440> of it.

And they made<WH6213> two<WH8147> gold<WH2091> rings<WH2885> and placed<WH7760> [them] on the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the breastpiece,<WH2833> on its inner<WH1004> edge<WH8193> which<WH834> was next<WH413> <WH5676> to the ephod.<WH646>

Furthermore, they made<WH6213> two<WH8147> gold<WH2091> rings<WH2885> and placed<WH5414> them on the bottom<WH4295> of the two<WH8147> shoulder<WH3802> pieces of the ephod,<WH646> on the front<WH6440> of it, close<WH5980> to the place<WH4225> where<WH4225> it joined,<WH4225> above<WH4480> <WH4605> the woven<WH2805> band<WH2805> of the ephod.<WH646>

And they bound<WH7405> the breastpiece<WH2833> by its rings<WH2885> to the rings<WH2885> of the ephod<WH646> with a blue<WH8504> cord,<WH6616> that it might be on the woven<WH2805> band<WH2805> of the ephod,<WH646> and that the breastpiece<WH2833> might not come<WH2118> loose<WH2118> from the ephod,<WH646> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
Then he made<WH6213> the robe<WH4598> of the ephod<WH646> of woven<WH707> work,<WH4639> all<WH3632> of blue;<WH8504>

and the opening<WH6310> of the robe<WH4598> was [at the top] in the center,<WH8432> as the opening<WH6310> of a coat<WH8473> of mail,<WH8473> with a binding<WH8193> all<WH5439> around<WH5439> its opening,<WH6310> that it might not be torn.<WH7167>
And they made<WH6213> pomegranates<WH7416> of blue<WH8504> and purple<WH713> and scarlet<WH8144> [material and] twisted<WH7806> [linen] on the hem<WH7757> of the robe.<WH4598>

They also made<WH6213> bells<WH6472> of pure<WH2889> gold,<WH2091> and put<WH5414> the bells<WH6472> between<WH8432> the pomegranates<WH7416> all<WH5439> around<WH5439> on the hem<WH7757> of the robe,<WH7757>

alternating a bell<WH6472> and a pomegranate<WH7416> all<WH5439> around<WH5439> on the hem<WH7757> of the robe,<WH7757> for the service,<WH8334> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And they made<WH6213> the tunics<WH3801> of finely<WH8336> woven<WH707> linen<WH8336> for Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121>

and the turban<WH4701> of fine<WH8336> linen,<WH8336> and the decorated<WH6287> caps<WH4021> of fine<WH8336> linen,<WH8336> and the linen<WH906> breeches<WH4370> of fine<WH8336> twisted<WH7806> linen,<WH8336>

and the sash<WH73> of fine<WH8336> twisted<WH7806> linen,<WH8336> and blue<WH8504> and purple<WH713> and scarlet<WH8144> [material,] the work<WH4639> of the weaver,<WH7551> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And they made<WH6213> the plate<WH6731> of the holy<WH6944> crown<WH5145> of pure<WH2889> gold,<WH2091> and inscribed<WH3789> it like the engravings<WH6603> of a signet,<WH2368> "Holy<WH6944> to the Lord.<WH3068>"
And they fastened<WH5414> a blue<WH8504> cord<WH6616> to it, to fasten<WH5414> it on the turban<WH4701> above,<WH4480> <WH4605> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

Thus all<WH3605> the work<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> was completed;<WH3615> and the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses;<WH4872> so<WH3651> they did.<WH6213>

And they brought<WH935> the tabernacle<WH4908> to Moses,<WH4872> the tent<WH168> and all<WH3605> its furnishings:<WH3627> its clasps,<WH7165> its boards,<WH7175> its bars,<WH1280> and its pillars<WH5982> and its sockets;<WH134>
and the covering<WH4372> of rams' skins<WH5785> dyed<WH119> red,<WH119> and the covering<WH4372> of porpoise<WH8476> skins,<WH5785> and the screening<WH4539> veil;<WH6532>
the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715> and its poles<WH905> and the mercy<WH3727> seat;<WH3727>
the table,<WH7979> all<WH3605> its utensils,<WH3627> and the bread<WH3899> of the Presence;<WH6440>
the pure<WH2889> [gold] lampstand,<WH4501> with its arrangement<WH4634> of lamps<WH5216> and all<WH3605> its utensils,<WH3627> and the oil<WH8081> for the light;<WH3974>
and the gold<WH2091> altar,<WH4196> and the anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081> and the fragrant<WH5561> incense,<WH7004> and the veil<WH4539> for the doorway<WH6607> of the tent;<WH168>
the bronze<WH5178> altar<WH4196> and its bronze<WH5178> grating,<WH4346> its poles<WH905> and all<WH3605> its utensils,<WH3627> the laver<WH3595> and its stand;<WH3653>

the hangings<WH7050> for the court,<WH2691> its pillars<WH5982> and its sockets,<WH134> and the screen<WH4539> for the gate<WH8179> of the court,<WH2691> its cords<WH4340> and its pegs<WH3489> and all<WH3605> the equipment<WH3627> for the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> for the tent<WH168> of meeting;<WH4150>

the woven<WH8278> garments<WH899> for ministering<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place and the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> for Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> and the garments<WH899> of his sons,<WH1121> to minister<WH3547> as priests.<WH3547>
So the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> all<WH3605> the work<WH5656> according to all<WH3605> that the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And Moses<WH4872> examined<WH7200> all<WH3605> the work<WH4399> and behold,<WH2009> they had done<WH6213> it; just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded,<WH6680> this<WH3651> they had done.<WH6213> So Moses<WH4872> blessed<WH1288> them.
